Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处阳光下，其进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Pincer Staff.name: 钳杖
Pincer Staff.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过中型，则其陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。且 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 无法再次发动钳杖攻击，直至擒抱结束。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若你的生物体型不超过中型，则陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 12， [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。且寇涛驱策者无法再次发动钳杖攻击，直至擒抱结束。

Shield of Faith.name: 虔诚护盾
Shield of Faith.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]，并使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

CqajRrRLSFDDOQPA.name: 虔诚护盾
CqajRrRLSFDDOQPA.description: 一片闪着微光的魔法力场围绕着施法距离内你指定的一个生物，使目标在法术持续时间内 AC 获得+2 加值。

Shimmering Field.name: 微光力场
Shimmering Field.description: 你在法术持续时间内 AC 获得+2 加值。

Lacedon Ghoul.name: 食尸水鬼
Lacedon Ghoul.description:
食尸鬼

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.DN8RNyJ7NsoA7TnO caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

食尸水鬼

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.DIgn5Jug9peaUxrv caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmIcyBite0000000]] 攻击。

Icy Bite.name: 阴寒啃咬
Icy Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]， 且目标速度降低 5 尺直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始。

Speed: -5 ft..name: 速度：降低 5 尺
Speed: -5 ft..description: 目标速度降低 5 尺直至攻击生物的下一回合开始。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=fDMRlni8W3d3QoOD]] [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=fDMRlni8W3d3QoOD]], it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=fDMRlni8W3d3QoOD]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Watery Rush.name: Watery Rush
Watery Rush.description: While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=xoYfePV5epjJkYHX]] without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks].

Expend Use.name: Expend Use
Expend Use.condition: moves up to half its Swim Speed

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmCorruptingTouc]].

Corrupting Touch.name: Corrupting Touch
Corrupting Touch.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=F4cByCi1IEouN08a]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=F4cByCi1IEouN08a]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=F4cByCi1IEouN08a]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions.

Cursed, Charmed & Poisoned.name: Cursed, Charmed & Poisoned
Cursed, Charmed & Poisoned.description: Until the curse ends, the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self} (can appear as a Large or Medium biped), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGeas000000]{Geas}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMajorImage]{Major Image}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}

Leap.name: Leap
Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps up to [[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] feet by [[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]].

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻影
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用一个研究动作调查该声响或影像时，必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。幻象在看穿它的生物面前会显得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其它声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件大小不得大于一个边长 5 尺的立方体。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Geas.name: Geas
Geas.description:
你对施法距离内你能看见的一个生物下达一条魔法口头命令，并强迫其执行相应的某种服务或克制某种行为，或者遵照你的要求行动。目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则将在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态。目标不能理解你的命令，则其在豁免中自动成功。

被魅惑生物每次做出与你的命令相悖的行为时，即受到 [[/damage 5d10 type=psychic]]伤害。该伤害一日至多生效一次。

除了涉及导致必死结果的行为外，你向目标下达的任何命令都会生效。如果你发布自杀指令则法术即时终止。

一道 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000] 可以终止该法术。

升环施法： 使用七环或八环法术位施展该法术时，持续时间变为 365 日。使用九环法术位施展该法术时，法术将一直持续至被上文提及的法术所终止。

Under Orders.name: Under Orders
Under Orders.description: While &Reference[Charmed apply=false], the creature takes [[/damage 5d10 type=psyhic]] damage if it acts in a manner directly counter to your command. It takes this damage no more than once each day.

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Larva.name: Larva
Larva.description:
Larvae

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Tg5WKzTIgNAHo1Wq caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Larva

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.giSj09GeYhBxyMFk caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Lemure.name: Lemure
Lemure.description:
Lemures

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.StGSoy9GntE0mCiY caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Lemure

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.HJOkVF1j68fs3m7Y caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Hellish Restoration.name: Hellish Restoration
Hellish Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies in the Nine Hells, it revives with all its Hit Points in [[/r 1d10]] days unless it is killed by a creature under the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless} spell or its remains are sprinkled with Holy Water.

Lich.name: Lich
Lich.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagComponentPo]{Component Pouch}

Lich

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.ffwjHi6PTfPQRIZV caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Lich Lairs

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.igvMYutrjUg3LAHv caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Component Pouch.name: Component Pouch
Component Pouch.description: A Component Pouch is watertight and filled with compartments that hold all the free Material components of your spells.

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Spirit Jar.name: Spirit Jar
Spirit Jar.description: If destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reforms in [[/r 1d10]] days if it has a spirit jar, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s lair.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks, using [[/item .6qvUZeTimud7ekV8]] or [[/item .9p8yotv4r7nt3NWl]] in any combination.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 5 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt} (level 5 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation}

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimateDea]{Animate Dead}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDimensionD]{Dimension Door}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplChainLight]{Chain Lightning}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFingerofDe]{Finger of Death}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPowerWordK]{Power Word Kill}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Detect Thoughts.name: Detect Thoughts
Detect Thoughts.description:
You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don’t read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target’s mind right now. If the target doesn’t know any languages and isn’t telepathic, you learn nothing.

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target’s mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target’s reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target’s mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target ends. For each ongoing spell of level 4 or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability (DC 10 plus that spell’s level). On a successful check, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You automatically end a spell on the target if the spell’s level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you use.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.description:
A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation
Prestidigitation.description:
You create a magical effect within range. Choose the effect from the options below. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time.

Sensory Effect. You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor.

Fire Play. You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

Clean or Soil. You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.

Minor Sensation. You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour.

Magic Mark. You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.

Minor Creation. You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand. It lasts until the end of your next turn. A trinket can deal no damage and has no monetary worth.

Animate Dead.name: Animate Dead
Animate Dead.description:
Choose a pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or Small Humanoid within range. The target becomes an Undead creature: a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSkeleton00]{Skeleton} if you chose bones or a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobZombie0000]{Zombie} if you chose a corpse.

On each of your turns, you can take a Bonus Action to mentally command any creature you made with this spell if the creature is within 60 feet of you (if you control multiple creatures, you can command any of them at the same time, issuing the same command to each one). You decide what action the creature will take and where it will move on its next turn, or you can issue a general command, such as to guard a chamber or corridor. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the Dodge action and moves only to avoid harm. Once given an order, the creature continues to follow it until its task is complete.

The creature is under your control for 24 hours, after which it stops obeying any command you’ve given it. To maintain control of the creature for another 24 hours, you must cast this spell on the creature again before the current 24-hour period ends. This use of the spell reasserts your control over up to four creatures you have animated with this spell rather than animating a new creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You animate or reassert control over two additional Undead creatures for each spell slot level above 3. Each of the creatures must come from a different corpse or pile of bones.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as “200 feet straight downward” or “300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle.”

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Plane Shift.name: 位面转移
Plane Shift.description:
你和至多八名手牵着手形成一个圆圈的生物被输送到一个不同的存在位面。你可以概括地指名一个目的地，比如火元素位面的黄铜之城或九层地狱第二层迪斯帕特的宫殿，按照DM的判断，你将出现在目的地里或其附近。

另外，如果你知道某个处于另一位面的传送法阵的印记序列，则该法术可以把你带到该法阵处。如果该传送法阵太小而装不下所有你输送的生物，则他们会出现在离传送法阵最近的未占空间中。

Chain Lightning.name: 连锁闪电
Chain Lightning.description:
你放出一道闪电，射向施法距离内某个你能看见的指定目标。经过首个目标后，闪电分成三束跳向该目标30尺内至多3个其他目标。闪电的目标可以是生物或物件，但每束闪电必须指定不同的目标。

每个目标必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者将受到10d8点闪电伤害，豁免成功受到半数伤害。

升环施法： 使用高于六环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比六环高一环，跳跃后闪电就多分出一束射向一个不同的目标。

Finger of Death.name: 死亡一指
Finger of Death.description:
你向施法距离内的一个可见生物释放负能量。该生物必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败则受到 7d8 + 30 点暗蚀伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

被该法术杀死的类人将在你下一回合开始时被唤起为一只受你操控的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobZombie0000]（见附录B），并在随后尽力遵循你的口头指令。

Power Word Kill.name: 律令死亡
Power Word Kill.description: 你强迫一名施法距离内你可见的生物死亡。若目标的生命值为 100 点或更少，则其立即死亡。否则，其受到 10d12 点心灵伤害。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Protective Magic.name: 护身魔法
Protective Magic.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield}（触发条件见这些法术），使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

Counterspell.name: 法术反制
Counterspell.description: 你试图打断一名正在施法的生物。该生物进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败则法术消散且毫无效果，并且用于施展法术的动作、附赠动作或反应随之浪费。如果那道法术是使用法术位施展的，则法术位并不会被消耗。

Shield.name: 护盾术
Shield.description: 一道看不见的力场制护盾浮现在你身旁，保护着你。在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

Imperceptible Barrier.name: 无形护盾
Imperceptible Barrier.description: 在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有+5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

Deathly Teleport.name: 蚀命传送
Deathly Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]] [[lookup @range.units activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]]. [[lookup @range.special activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]], and each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]]. of the space it left takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Disrupt Life.name: 扰乱生命
Disrupt Life.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qSz7l1czwIc5j9gP]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=qSz7l1czwIc5j9gP]] that isn’t an Undead in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=qSz7l1czwIc5j9gP]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Frightening Gaze.name: 恐惧凝视
Frightening Gaze.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFear000000]{Fear}，使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下个回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Fear.name: 恐惧术
Fear.description:
30 尺锥状区域内的所有生物必须成功于一次感知豁免，豁免失败者将丢弃其所有持握物，并在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态。

以此法被恐慌的生物必须在其回合内执行 &Reference[dash] 动作，并以此寻找最安全的路线远离你，直至其无路可走为止。如果该生物结束其回合时位于一处使其视觉线中没有你的空间，则其可以再进行一次感知豁免，豁免成功则法术对该生物的效应终止。

Fear.name: 恐惧
Fear.description: 法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态。以此法被恐慌的生物必须在其回合内执行 &Reference[dash] 动作，并以此寻找最安全的路线远离你，直至其无路可走为止。如果该生物结束其回合时位于一处使其视觉线中没有你的空间，则其可以再进行一次感知豁免，豁免成功则法术对该生物的效应终止。

Paralyzing Touch.name: 麻痹之触
Paralyzing Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]， 且目标陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态，直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一回合开始。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false]状态, 直至巫妖的下一回合开始。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 未失能的盟友，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Running Leap.name: Running Leap
Running Leap.description: With a 10-foot running start, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can Long Jump up to 25 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmRoar0000000000]].

Roar.name: Roar
Roar.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Lizardfolk Geomancer.name: 蜥蜴人地脉术师
Lizardfolk Geomancer.description:
Lizardfolk

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Io4JcuHDAySsBlvu caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Lizardfolk Geomancer

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.85wfFNgms1hLuQ0m caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmEarthBurst0000]] attacks.

Hail of Stone.name: Hail of Stone
Hail of Stone.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=wVQbYLwPnJlczoss]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=wVQbYLwPnJlczoss]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=wVQbYLwPnJlczoss]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=wVQbYLwPnJlczoss]]-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=wVQbYLwPnJlczoss]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplElementali]{Elementalism}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMeldintoSt]{Meld into Stone}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithP]{Speak with Plants}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpikeGrowt]{Spike Growth}

Elementalism.name: Elementalism
Elementalism.description:
You exert control over the elements, creating one of the following effects within range.

Beckon Air. You create a breeze strong enough to ripple cloth, stir dust, rustle leaves, and close open doors and shutters, all in a 5-foot Cube. Doors and shutters being held open by someone or something aren’t affected.

Beckon Earth. You create a thin shroud of dust or sand that covers surfaces in a 5-foot-square area, or you cause a single word to appear in your handwriting in a patch of dirt or sand.

Beckon Fire. You create a thin cloud of harmless embers and colored, scented smoke in a 5-foot Cube. You choose the color and scent, and the embers can light candles, torches, or lamps in that area. The smoke’s scent lingers for 1 minute.

Beckon Water. You create a spray of cool mist that lightly dampens creatures and objects in a 5-foot Cube. Alternatively, you create 1 cup of clean water either in an open container or on a surface, and the water evaporates in 1 minute.

Sculpt Element. You cause dirt, sand, fire, smoke, mist, or water that can fit in a 1-foot Cube to assume a crude shape (such as that of a creature) for 1 hour.

Beckon Element.name: Beckon Element
Beckon Element.chatFlavor: Fire and water beckoning lasts for 1 minute

Meld into Stone.name: Meld into Stone
Meld into Stone.description:
You step into a stone object or surface large enough to fully contain your body, merging yourself and your equipment with the stone for the duration. You must touch the stone to do so. Nothing of your presence remains visible or otherwise detectable by nonmagical senses.

While merged with the stone, you can’t see what occurs outside it, and any [[/check ability=wis skill=prc]] checks you make to hear sounds outside it are made with Disadvantage. You remain aware of the passage of time and can cast spells on yourself while merged in the stone. You can use 5 feet of movement to leave the stone where you entered it, which ends the spell. You otherwise can’t move.

Minor physical damage to the stone doesn’t harm you, but its partial destruction or a change in its shape (to the extent that you no longer fit within it) expels you and deals [[/damage 6d6 type=force]] damage to you. The stone’s complete destruction (or transmutation into a different substance) expels you and deals [[/damage 50 type=force]] damage to you. If expelled, you move into an unoccupied space closest to where you first entered and have the &Reference[prone] condition.

Speak with Plants.name: Speak with Plants
Speak with Plants.description:
You imbue plants in an immobile 30-foot Emanation with limited sentience and animation, giving them the ability to communicate with you and follow your simple commands. You can question plants about events in the spell’s area within the past day, gaining information about creatures that have passed, weather, and other circumstances.

You can also turn &Reference[difficultterrain] caused by plant growth (such as thickets and undergrowth) into ordinary terrain that lasts for the duration. Or you can turn ordinary terrain where plants are present into Difficult Terrain that lasts for the duration.

The spell doesn’t enable plants to uproot themselves and move about, but they can move their branches, tendrils, and stalks for you.

If a Plant creature is in the area, you can communicate with it as if you shared a common language.

Spike Growth.name: Spike Growth
Spike Growth.description:
The ground in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within range sprouts hard spikes and thorns. The area becomes Difficult Terrain for the duration. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes [[/damage 2d4 type=piercing]] damage for every 5 feet it travels.

The transformation of the ground is camouflaged to look natural. Any creature that can’t see the area when the spell is cast must take a Search action and succeed on a [[/check ability=wis skill=prc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] or [[/check ability=wis skill=sur dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC to recognize the terrain as hazardous before entering it.

Lizardfolk Sovereign.name: 蜥蜴人大王
Lizardfolk Sovereign.description:
Lizardfolk

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Io4JcuHDAySsBlvu caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Lizardfolk Sovereign

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.2w4jxh9j1P9Lr9d1 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack and one [[/item .mmEarthenMaul000]] attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature that isn’t a Construct or an Undead, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains Temporary Hit Points equal to the damage dealt.

Earthen Maul.name: Earthen Maul
Earthen Maul.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to [[lookup @range.special activity=Y2IncZu5BjB42z7l]] straight toward an enemy it can see.

Mage.name: Mage
Mage.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcWand000000]{Wand}

Mages

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.BRPgUa1VGeHBz5BR caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Mage

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.G2fA16d9pkedAKnr caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Wand.name: Wand
Wand.description: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmArcaneBurst000]] attacks.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor} (included in AC), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation}

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 4 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplConeofCold]{Cone of Cold}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

BtkwckQJktc8hRh0.name: Misty Step
BtkwckQJktc8hRh0.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Protective Magic.name: Protective Magic
Protective Magic.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to the spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn’t expended.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: An imperceptible barrier of magical force protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

Imperceptible Barrier.name: Imperceptible Barrier
Imperceptible Barrier.description: Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from Magic Missile.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
你触碰一个大型或者更小，且未被他人携带或着装的物件。在法术终止前，物件将在其 20 尺半径范围内发出明亮光照，并在其外 20 尺范围发出微光光照。光的颜色由你决定。

该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。如果你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你触碰一个未着装护甲的自愿生物。直至法术终止前，目标的基础 AC 变为 13 + 它的敏捷调整值。目标着装护甲则法术提前终止。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Fireball.name: 火球术
Fireball.description:
明亮的闪光从你的指间飞驰向施法距离内你指定的一点，并随着一声低吼迸成一片烈焰。目标点周围半径 20 尺球状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者将受到 8d6 点火焰伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

区域内所有未被着装或携带的可燃物件会开始燃烧。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，其伤害就增加 1d6。

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description:
你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Cone of Cold.name: 寒冰锥
Cone of Cold.description:
你释放出一团寒冷的空气。以你为源点的 60 尺锥状区域内的每名生物进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败受到 8d8 寒冷伤害，豁免成功则受到一半伤害。被该法术杀死的生物将成为一尊冰冻塑像直至其被解冻。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比五环高一环，法术伤害就增加1d8。

Fly.name: 飞行术
Fly.description:
你触碰一个自愿生物。目标在法术持续时间内获得 60 尺的飞行速度且可以悬浮。法术终止时，如果目标仍在空中则随即坠落，除非其能停止坠落。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，就可以额外再指定一名生物作为法术目标。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Mage Apprentice.name: 魔法学徒
Mage Apprentice.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagComponentPo]{Component Pouch}

Mages

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.BRPgUa1VGeHBz5BR caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Mage Apprentice

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Lu0aXXNBNrEZuygN caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Component Pouch.name: 材料包
Component Pouch.description: 材料包是一种装有你法术所需的一切免费材料的防水小包。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]], +5 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIceKnife00]{Ice Knife}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor} (included in AC), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThunderwav]{Thunderwave}

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
You create a magical effect within range. Choose the effect from the options below. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time.

Sensory Effect. You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor.

Fire Play. You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

Clean or Soil. You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.

Minor Sensation. You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour.

Magic Mark. You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.

Minor Creation. You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand. It lasts until the end of your next turn. A trinket can deal no damage and has no monetary worth.

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Ice Knife.name: Ice Knife
Ice Knife.description:
You create a shard of ice and fling it at one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 Piercing damage. Hit or miss, the shard then explodes. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 Cold damage.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The Cold damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 1.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: 你触碰一个未着装护甲的自愿生物。直至法术终止前，目标的基础 AC 变为 13 + 它的敏捷调整值。目标着装护甲则法术提前终止。

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Thunderwave.name: 雷鸣波
Thunderwave.description:
You unleash a wave of thunderous energy. Each creature in a 15-foot Cube originating from you makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 Thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

In addition, unsecured objects that are entirely within the Cube are pushed 10 feet away from you, and a thunderous boom is audible within 300 feet.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Magma Mephit.name: 熔岩魔蝠
Magma Mephit.description:
Mephits

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.C5AnYUB2Vhu0urqS caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Magma Mephit

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.QvLBV3IvfwSLB6e2 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Death Burst.name: 自爆
Death Burst.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Fire Breath.name: 火焰吐息
Fire Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]] 尺长、 [[lookup @target.template.width activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]] 尺宽锥状区域内每个生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害。

成功：半伤。

Death Burst.name: 自爆
Death Burst.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Touch.name: Touch
Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature or a flammable object that isn’t being worn or carried, it starts burning.

Ignited Illumination.name: Ignited Illumination
Ignited Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sets itself ablaze or extinguishes its flames. While ablaze, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmGore0000000000]] attacks.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended average]]. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 若猛犸使用了移动攻击特性且你的体型不超过巨型，你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Trample.name: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态，如果野猪使用了移动攻击的特性。
Trample.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]] feet that has the Prone condition.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Manes.name: 原魔
Manes.description:
原魔

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.veNtTec5Xx4Cu1Y9 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

原魔

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.THQIg50PcHdnwG4d caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Manes Vaporspawn.description:
原魔

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.veNtTec5Xx4Cu1Y9 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Contortionist.name: 擅曲之物
Contortionist.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以移动穿过最窄 1 寸宽的空间而无需消耗额外的移动力。

Sickening Vapors.name: 致病蒸汽
Sickening Vapors.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=a9NAwfq8B1qvfEi7]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=a9NAwfq8B1qvfEi7]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Sickening Vapors for 24 hours.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态直至下一回合结束。

Shadow Stealth.name: 幽影隐匿
Shadow Stealth.description: 在微光光照或黑暗环境下， [[lookup @name lowercase]] 执行 &Reference[躲藏] 动作。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]使用[[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 或 [[/item .mmTailSpike00000]]发动共计三次攻击。

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Elemental Restoration.name: 元素重生
Elemental Restoration.description: p class="feature">若[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @item.requirements]]于水元素位面之外死去，其身躯会化为海水，并在[[/r 1d4#Days]] 天后于水元素位面某处获得一具新的身体，以满生命值复活。

Wishes.name: 祈愿
Wishes.description: 每个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 都有 [[/r 1d100cs<31#Knows Wish on 1]]{30%} 概率知晓法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]。若知晓，则[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以但仅能在有非巨灵生物向其许愿（以[[lookup @name lowercase]]能理解的方式）时为那个生物施展此法术。[[lookup @name lowercase]]为该生物施展祈愿术将不会承受祈愿术的负担。一旦此[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展过三次祈愿术，其接下来 365 天内无法再次施展此法术。

Wish.name: 祈愿术
Wish.description:
祈愿术 是凡间生物所能施展的最强大法术。你只需要大声说出自己的愿望就能改变现实世界本身。

法术最基础的用法是用来模仿任意一个八环或更低环阶的法术。如果你以此种方式使用该法术，你不需要满足目标法术所需的任何前提条件（包括有价值的材料成分）就可以让该法术生效。

除此之外，你也可以选择创造下列效应其中之一：

创造物件。 你创造出一个价值不超过 25000gp 的物件，该物件不能是魔法物品。该物件最长尺寸不能超过 300 尺，并随法术出现在地面上你能看见的一处未被占据位置。

即刻治疗。 你让你自己和至多二十个你可见的生物恢复其全部生命值，并且终止它们身上一切在高等复原术中描述过的所有效应。

伤害抗性。 你让至多十个你能看见的生物对你所指定的一种伤害类型具有抗性。这个抗性是永久存在的。

免疫法术。 你让最多十个你能看见的生物在接下来的八小时内免疫某种法术或其他魔法效应。

突来学识。 你将你的一个专长替换为符合条件的另一个专长。你失去旧专长带来的全部好处，并获得新专长的好处。你无法取代作为你其他专长或特性先决条件的专长。

重新掷骰。 你改变一件刚刚发生的事件。重掷前一轮的任意一次掷骰（包括你前一回合进行的掷骰），并让现实随着你的新掷骰结果改变。例如，祈愿术可以撤销队友的失败豁免或敌人的重击。你可以迫使重新进行的掷骰具有优势或劣势，并且可以选择是使用重投后的结果还是使用原来的结果。

重塑现实。 你可能会许愿一些没有包含在其他所有效应中的东西。为了做到这样，尽可能准确地向地下城主描述你的愿望。地下城主在这种情况下有极高的自由来裁决会发生什么。不过愿望越大，出错的概率就越大。法术可能会直接失败，也可能部分的达成你想要的结果，你还有可能因表述愿望时措辞不当而遭到意想不到的结果。例如，许愿让一个坏人死去可能会让你穿越到多年后该人已死的一个时间段，使你相当于离开了游戏一样。此外，许愿获取一件传说中的魔法物品或神器可能会立即将你传送到该物品当前的持有者身边。如果你许的愿望太过庞大，其效应影响到了社群、区域或是世界，你可能会引来强大的敌人。如果你的愿望会影响神，这名神的神仆会立刻干涉，阻止它或是鼓励你以一种特殊的方式许愿。如果你的愿望将会撤销多元宇宙本身，威胁到了印记城，或者以某种方式影响到了痛苦女士，你的心灵中就会浮现出她的影像：她摇了摇自己的脑袋，然后你的愿望失效了。

了模仿其他法术外，施展该法术以达成的任何其他目的都会使你的身躯承受极大的负担。承受负担期间，直到你完成长休之前，你每次施展法术时都将受到一定伤害（伤害数值取决于你施展的法术的环阶，每环阶 1d10 的暗蚀伤害），此伤害无法被任何方式减免。此外，你的力量属性值将降至 3（除非它已经是 3 或更低），持续 2d4 日。这段时间内，你每花一整日休息（不从事轻度活动以外的行为），恢复需要的日数就减少 2 日。最后，如果你承受了这种负担，你将有 [[/r 1d3cs1]]{33%} 的概率永远也无法再次施放祈愿术。

Wish Stress.name: 祈愿代价
Wish Stress.description: Each time you cast a spell until you finish a Long Rest, you take [[/damage 1d10 type=necrotic]] damage per level of that spell. This damage can’t be reduced or prevented in any way. In addition, your Strength score becomes 3 for [[/r 2d4]] days.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmAquaticLash000]] attacks.

Water Jet.name: Water Jet
Water Jet.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]]-foot-wide Line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the attacking creature and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCreateorDe]{Create or Destroy Water}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectEvil]{Detect Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPurifyFood]{Purify Food and Drink}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplControlWat]{Control Water}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGaseousFor]{Gaseous Form}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTongues000]{Tongues}

Create or Destroy Water.name: Create or Destroy Water
Create or Destroy Water.description:
You do one of the following:

Create Water. You create up to 10 gallons of clean water within range in an open container. Alternatively, the water falls as rain in a 30-foot Cube within range, extinguishing exposed flames there.

Destroy Water. You destroy up to 10 gallons of water in an open container within range. Alternatively, you destroy fog in a 30-foot Cube within range.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You create or destroy 10 additional gallons of water, or the size of the Cube increases by 5 feet, for each spell slot level above 1.

Detect Evil and Good.name: Detect Evil and Good
Detect Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, you sense the location of any Aberration, Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead within 30 feet of yourself. You also sense whether the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell is active there and, if so, where.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Purify Food and Drink.name: Purify Food and Drink
Purify Food and Drink.description: You remove poison and rot from nonmagical food and drink in a 5-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within range.

Control Water.name: Control Water
Control Water.description:
Until the spell ends, you control any water inside an area you choose that is a Cube up to 100 feet on a side, using one of the following effects. As a Magic action on your later turns, you can repeat the same effect or choose a different one.

Flood. You cause the water level of all standing water in the area to rise by as much as 20 feet. If you choose an area in a large body of water, you instead create a 20-foot tall wave that travels from one side of the area to the other and then crashes. Any Huge or smaller vehicles in the wave’s path are carried with it to the other side. Any Huge or smaller vehicles struck by the wave have a [[/r 1d100cs<26#Vehicle is capsized]]{25 percent} chance of capsizing.

The water level remains elevated until the spell ends or you choose a different effect. If this effect produced a wave, the wave repeats on the start of your next turn while the flood effect lasts.

Part Water. You part water in the area and create a trench. The trench extends across the spell’s area, and the separated water forms a wall to either side. The trench remains until the spell ends or you choose a different effect. The water then slowly fills in the trench over the course of the next round until the normal water level is restored.

Redirect Flow. You cause flowing water in the area to move in a direction you choose, even if the water has to flow over obstacles, up walls, or in other unlikely directions. The water in the area moves as you direct it, but once it moves beyond the spell’s area, it resumes its flow based on the terrain. The water continues to move in the direction you chose until the spell ends or you choose a different effect.

Whirlpool. You cause a whirlpool to form in the center of the area, which must be at least 50 feet square and 25 feet deep. The whirlpool lasts until you choose a different effect or the spell ends. The whirlpool is 5 feet wide at the base, up to 50 feet wide at the top, and 25 feet tall. Any creature in the water and within 25 feet of the whirlpool is pulled 10 feet toward it. When a creature enters the whirlpool for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there, it makes a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 2d8 Bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage. A creature can swim away from the whirlpool only if it first takes an action to pull away and succeeds on a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC.

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
A willing creature you touch shape-shifts, along with everything it’s wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration. The spell ends on the target if it drops to 0 Hit Points or if it takes a Magic action to end the spell on itself.

While in this form, the target’s only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can’t talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can’t attack or cast spells.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
The target’s only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can’t talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can’t attack or cast spells.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

Tongues.name: Tongues
Tongues.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken or signed language that it hears or sees. Moreover, when the target communicates by speaking or signing, any creature that knows at least one language can understand it if that creature can hear the speech or see the signing.

Misty Veil.name: Misty Veil
Misty Veil.description: The marid casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFogCloud00]{Fog Cloud}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Fog Cloud.name: Fog Cloud
Fog Cloud.description:
You create a 20-foot-radius Sphere of fog centered on a point within range. The Sphere is &Reference[heavilyobscured]. It lasts for the duration or until a strong wind (such as one created by @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind}) disperses it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The fog’s radius increases by 20 feet for each spell slot level above 1.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Demonic Restoration.name: Demonic Restoration
Demonic Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

Reactive.name: Reactive
Reactive.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take one &Reference[Reaction] on every turn of combat.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes six [[/item .mmPactBlade00000]] attacks and uses [[/item .mmConstrict00000]].

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description:
力量豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] 尺内[[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的体型[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]]的生物。

Petrifying Gaze.name: Petrifying Gaze
Petrifying Gaze.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sees its reflection in the [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make this save.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

Restrained.name: Restrained

Petrified.name: Petrified

Aquatic Burst.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[倒地] 状态。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下一道法术，无需材料成分并使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免DC15 [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplElementali]{Elementalism}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplControlWat]{Control Water}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCreateorDe]{Create or Destroy Water}

Elementalism.name: 四象法门
Elementalism.description:
你操控元素，在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。

召气。 你在 5 尺立方范围内创造一股足以吹动布料，搅动灰尘，使落叶沙沙作响，关闭打开的门和百叶窗的和风。若打开的门或百叶窗被某人或某物顶住，则其不受该效应影响。

召土。 你创造灰尘或沙子组成的薄帷，覆盖在 5 尺方状区域内的表面上，或者你可以在一堆泥土或沙子中使一个单词以你的手写体出现。

召火。 你在 5 尺立方范围内创造一片无害余烬与一股富有色彩和气味的烟。你选择烟的色彩和气味，而余烬可以点燃区域中的蜡烛、火把或油灯。烟的气味会存留 1 分钟。

召水。 你在 5 尺立方范围内创造一片凉爽的，使范围内生物和物件略微潮湿的雾气。或者，你可以在一个打开的容器或表面上创造一杯干净的水，水会在 1 分钟内蒸发。

塑形元素。 你使 1 尺立方区域内的泥土、沙子、火焰、烟尘、雾气或水呈现出一个粗略的形状（如一名生物），持续 1 小时。

Beckon Element.name: 召唤元素
Beckon Element.chatFlavor: 水、火召唤效果持续 1 分钟。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
你触碰一个大型或者更小，且未被他人携带或着装的物件。在法术终止前，物件将在其 20 尺半径范围内发出明亮光照，并在其外 20 尺范围发出微光光照。光的颜色由你决定。

该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。如果你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

Control Water.name: 操控水体
Control Water.description:
直到法术结束为止，你控制你指定的一处边长 100 尺的立方区域中的任意一处独立水体，从以下效应中选择其一生效。在你之后的每个自己回合中，你可以用一个魔法动作重复同一效应，或是选择另一效应。

上涨。你使控制区域内水位上涨至多20尺。如果你指定的区域是一片大水体中的一部分，则你改为制造一片 20 尺高的波浪，并从区域的一边扑向另一边再拍下水面。波浪中任何巨型Huge或更小的载具都会被带到水浪行进的另一边。且所有巨型或更小的载具都有 [[/r 1d100cs<26#Vehicle is capsized]]{25%} 的几率倾覆。

直至法术终止或你选择另一个效应前，水位的上涨情况将保持不变。如果该效应用以产生波浪，则波浪在你下一回合开始时再次进行翻打。

分水。你使区域内的水体分开并形成一条水体的沟壑。沟壑从法术区域的一头延伸到另一头，而被分开的水体则在两边形成两道水墙。沟壑持续存在至法术终止或直至你选择另一个效应。该效应终止时，水流会逐渐在下一轮中将沟壑填满，直至其恢复成通常的水位。

转向。你使区域内的水体向一个你自选的方向流动，即使水流需要绕过障碍，或沿着墙壁向上流，甚至流向一些不太可能的方向，区域内的水体都将遵照你指使的方向流动，但一旦其流出法术区域，则会重新基于其所在地形选择流向。水体持续向你所选方向流动，直至法术终止或直至你选择另一效应。

漩涡。该效应需要水体至少为 50 尺的方形区域并且至少有 25 尺深。你在区域中央形成一个漩涡。其形态为底部宽 5 尺，顶部宽 50 尺，高 25 尺。水中任何距漩涡 25 尺内的生物或物件均被漩涡向自身拉动 10 尺。当一名生物在一个回合内第一次进入漩涡或在漩涡内结束其回合时，受影响的生物进行一次力量豁免。豁免失败则受到 2d8 点钝击伤害。豁免成功则只受一半伤害。一名生物若想以游泳方式离开漩涡，则必须先用一个动作远离漩涡并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定。

Create or Destroy Water.name: 造水术/枯水术
Create or Destroy Water.description:
你选择其一执行：

造水术。 你在施法距离内一个打开的容器中创造至多10加仑干净的水。作为另一种选项，你使施法距离内一处30尺的立方区域降下雨水并浇灭区域内不受遮盖的火焰。

枯水术。你使施法距离内一个打开的容器里至多10加仑水枯竭不见。作为另一种选项，你使施法距离内一片30尺立方 区域的浓雾消失不见。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就多创造或多枯竭10加仑额外的水分，另一种选项能影响的立方 区域边长增加5尺。

Watery Rebuke.name: 潮浪反斥
Watery Rebuke.description:
触发： 一名 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的 [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=nCfH0YgOhJR2wIKd]] 进入 [[lookup @range.value activity=nCfH0YgOhJR2wIKd]] 尺之内[[lookup @name lowercase]]. 响应-力量豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=nCfH0YgOhJR2wIKd]]，触发生物。

失败： [[/damage average]] 伤害。若目标不超过大型，则其被 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 咒唤的水流直线推离30尺。

Merrow.description:

Bite.name: 啃咬

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]使用 [[/item .mmClaws000000000]] 或 [[/item .mmMercurialTride]]发动共计两次攻击。

Mercurial Trident.name: 变幻三叉戟
Mercurial Trident.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]].。命中或失手： [[lookup @name lowercase]]三叉戟在远程攻击后立即魔法地回到 [[lookup @name lowercase]]爪中。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展以下一道法术，无需任何材料成分并使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCloudkill0]{死云术}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{黑暗术}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{解除魔法}

Teleport.name: 传送
Teleport.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]传送至多[[lookup @range.value activity=dnoRMdFzhUUku26D]] 尺到一处其可见的未占空间。其可以将一名正被其擒抱的生物传送至目标空间5尺内的未占据空间。

Cloudkill.name: 死云术
Cloudkill.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，在以该点为中心、半径 20 尺球状区域内，创造一片黄绿色剧毒浓雾。雾气在法术持续时间内维持存在，但仍会被强风吹散（比如造风术）并解除法术。雾气存在区域视为重度遮蔽。

每名位于球状区域内的生物都进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败者受到5d8点毒素伤害，豁免成功则受到一半伤害。每当球状区域移动到一名生物区域内时、一名生物进入球状区域时或是在该区域结束其回合时，该生物同样需要进行一次豁免。一名生物一回合只需要进行一次该豁免。

在你的每个回合开始时，球状区域会往远离你的方向移动10尺。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比五环高一环，此法术的伤害就增加1d8。

Darkness.name: 黑暗术
Darkness.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，并在法术持续时间内使魔法性 &Reference[darkness] 斥以该点为中心半径 15 尺的球状区域。黑暗视觉也无法看穿这这种黑暗，非魔法的光照也无法将其照亮。

或者，你可以将此法术施展于一个未被着装或携带的物件上，使黑暗充斥以该物件为中心的 15 尺光环区域。将该物件用不透明的东西遮掩（比如用碗或头盔盖住）时，会将黑暗隔绝。

如果法术区域与任何二环或更低环阶法术创造的明亮光照或微光光照区域重叠，则这些造光的法术将被解除。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Adhesive (Object Form Only).name: 粘附（仅物件形态）
Adhesive (Object Form Only).description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 粘附在任何触碰到其的东西上。体型不超过巨型的被粘附生物陷入&Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。为逃脱此擒抱进行的属性检定具有劣势。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]，为逃脱此擒抱进行的属性检定具有劣势。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]] ([[lookup @activation.condition activity=Hx8Io6Uz1mJDm4Nf]]), reach [[lookup @range.value activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]] [[lookup @range.units activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]]. Hit: [[/damage average activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]] damage—or [[/damage average activity=Hx8Io6Uz1mJDm4Nf]] damage if the target is Grappled by the mimic.

Attacked if Grappling.name: Attacked if Grappling
Attacked if Grappling.condition: 若目标因该拟身怪受擒则具有优势

Pseudopod.name: 伪足

Ability checks made to escape this grapple have Disadvantage.
