Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Extract Brain.name: 采脑
Extract Brain.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]] that is Grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Tentacles.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]] damage.

Failure or Success: If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] kills it and devours its brain.

Tentacles.name: 触须
Tentacles.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过中型，则其被夺心魔的全部触须 &Reference[Stunned apply=false] （逃脱DC14 [[lookup @check.dc.formula activity=Vo2UIgas007G3QXv]]）。

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC).

Mind Blast.name: 心灵震爆
Mind Blast.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lHIQgEzz6hc3hjWx]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=lHIQgEzz6hc3hjWx]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=lHIQgEzz6hc3hjWx]]-foot. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=lHIQgEzz6hc3hjWx]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Stunned apply=false] 状态直至夺心魔的下一回合结束。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDominateMo]{Dominate Monster}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift} (self only)

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Dominate Monster.name: 支配怪物
Dominate Monster.description:
一名法术范围内你可见的生物必须成功于一次感知豁免，否则在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态。若你或你的盟友正在与其战斗，则目标在此豁免上具有优势。目标受到伤害时，可以重复进行豁免，豁免成功则其身上的此法术终止。

目标被魅惑期间，只要你与其处于同一位面就可以与之保持心灵感应。在你的回合，你可以通过心灵感应命令该生物（无需动作），比如“攻击那个生物”“跑到那个位置”或是“去拿那个物品”。目标完成一项指令却未收到你的进一步指示时，将会凭自身喜好行动，尽可能的保护自己。

你可以用自己的反应去要求目标执行一项反应。

升环施法： 使用更高环阶法术位施展时，你的专注能持续更长时间，九环至多 8 小时。

Dominated.name: 支配
Dominated.description: 当你受到伤害时，重复 [[/save ability=wis]] 豁免，成功时结束自身身上的法术效应。

Plane Shift.name: 位面转移
Plane Shift.description:
你和至多八名手牵着手形成一个圆圈的生物被输送到一个不同的存在位面。你可以概括地指名一个目的地，比如火元素位面的黄铜之城或九层地狱第二层迪斯帕特的宫殿，按照DM的判断，你将出现在目的地里或其附近。

另外，如果你知道某个处于另一位面的传送法阵的印记序列，则该法术可以把你带到该法阵处。如果该传送法阵太小而装不下所有你输送的生物，则他们会出现在离传送法阵最近的未占空间中。

Mind Flayer Arcanist.name: 夺心魔奥术师
Mind Flayer Arcanist.description:
装备： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmBreastplat]{胸甲}

Mind Flayers

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.5LyhJwnpglaWlV03 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

夺心魔奥术师

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.vVo5ft5neZAFeeJB caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item Arcane Tentacles]] 攻击。

Arcane Tentacles.name: 奥术触须
Arcane Tentacles.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]，且 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以将目标传送至多30尺至一处[[lookup @name lowercase]]可见的、有足以支撑目标的表面或液体的未占据空间中。 若目标因此伤害生命值降至0， [[lookup @name lowercase]] 杀死目标并以魔法吞食其大脑。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand} (the hand is Invisible)

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplClairvoyan]{Clairvoyance}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDimensionD]{Dimension Door}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 5 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt} (level 5 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift} (self only), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSending000]{Sending}

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法 detect magic
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Disguise Self.name: 易容术
Disguise Self.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Disguised.name: 乔装
Disguised.description: 一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Clairvoyance.name: 鹰眼术
Clairvoyance.description:
You create an Invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you (a place you have visited or seen before) or in an obvious location that is unfamiliar to you (such as behind a door, around a corner, or in a grove of trees). The intangible, invulnerable sensor remains in place for the duration.

When you cast the spell, choose seeing or hearing. You can use the chosen sense through the sensor as if you were in its space. As a Bonus Action, you can switch between seeing and hearing.

A creature that sees the sensor (such as a creature benefiting from See Invisibility or &Reference[truesight]) sees a luminous orb about the size of your fist.

Dimension Door.name: 任意门
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as “200 feet straight downward” or “300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle.”

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Fireball.name: 火球术 fireball
Fireball.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Lightning Bolt.name: 闪电束
Lightning Bolt.description:
A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Plane Shift.name: 位面转移
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

Sending.name: 短讯术
Sending.description:
You send a short message of 25 words or fewer to a creature you have met or a creature described to you by someone who has met it. The target hears the message in its mind, recognizes you as the sender if it knows you, and can answer in a like manner immediately. The spell enables targets to understand the meaning of your message.

You can send the message across any distance and even to other planes of existence, but if the target is on a different plane than you, there is a 5 percent chance that the message doesn’t arrive. You know if the delivery fails.

Upon receiving your message, a creature can block your ability to reach it again with this spell for 8 hours. If you try to send another message during that time, you learn that you are blocked, and the spell fails.

Mind Burst.name: Mind Burst
Mind Burst.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=T0ybbd1ZrLCdEXsW]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=T0ybbd1ZrLCdEXsW]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=T0ybbd1ZrLCdEXsW]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=T0ybbd1ZrLCdEXsW]]. Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=T0ybbd1ZrLCdEXsW]] damage only.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Shield.name: 护盾术
Shield.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to that spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Wfhu0qhU59IcOJ1D.name: 护盾术
Wfhu0qhU59IcOJ1D.description: 一道看不见的力场制护盾浮现在你身旁，保护着你。在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

Imperceptible Barrier.name: 无形护盾
Imperceptible Barrier.description: 在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有+5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

Gore.name: 顶撞
Gore.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended average]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=iBenqFiBu40bUxkH]] creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=iBenqFiBu40bUxkH]] straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 10 (3d8) Piercing damage and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: 攻击
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态，如果其使用了移动攻击的特性。

Paralysis Gas.name: 麻痹气体
Paralysis Gas.description:
Constitution Saving Throws: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]], it succeeds automatically.

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态，并在每个自身回合的结束时再进行一次该豁免，豁免成功则终止该效应。在 1 分钟后，豁免将自动成功。

Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Mud Mephit.name: 泥魔蝠
Mud Mephit.description:
Mephits

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.C5AnYUB2Vhu0urqS caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Death Burst.name: 临终苦难
Death Burst.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 你陷入&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态直至下一回合结束。

Mud Breath.name: 泥泞吐息
Mud Breath.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=i727Jd3IBfZezMPy]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=i727Jd3IBfZezMPy]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=i727Jd3IBfZezMPy]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: The target has the &Resource[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Beast of Burden.name: 驼兽
Beast of Burden.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] counts as one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

Mummy.name: 木乃伊
Mummy.description:
Mummies

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.YuuqpbH93Kq9hizu caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Mummy

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.KAmNNROqkQBqQmUr caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mummy makes two [[/item .mmRottingFist000]] attacks and uses [[/item .mmDreadfulGlare0]].

Rotting Fist.name: Rotting Fist
Rotting Fist.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can’t regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn’t return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description: If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can’t regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn’t return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

Dreadful Glare.name: Dreadful Glare
Dreadful Glare.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Dreadful Glare for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Mummy Lord.description:
Mummies

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Undead Restoration.name: Undead Restoration
Undead Restoration.description: If destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s lair. The heart is a Tiny object that has AC 17, HP 10, and Immunity to all damage except Fire.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Rotting Fist.name: Rotting Fist
Rotting Fist.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can’t regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn’t return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description: If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can’t regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn’t return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmRottingFist000]] or [[/item .d6GVHcFrHv83C7eS]] attack, and it uses [[/item .mmDreadfulGlare0]].

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]], +9 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimateDea]{Animate Dead}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHarm000000]{Harm}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInsectPlag]{Insect Plague} (level 7 version)

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Animate Dead.name: 活化死尸
Animate Dead.description:
在施法距离内指定一具中型或小型类人生物遗骨或遗体。目标将变为一名亡灵生物：遗骨变为 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSkeleton00]{骷髅}，遗体则变为@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobZombie0000]{丧尸}。（这些生物的资料卡见附录B）。

在你的每个回合内，你可以使用一个附赠动作并以精神命令操纵距离你 60 尺内，任何你用此法术制造的生物（如果你操纵多个生物，则你的命令可以同时传达给它们全部或是其中的某几个，不过每次只能为它们下达同一命令）。你决定被操纵生物下回合执行的动作和如何移动。或者，你也可以选择下达一条宽泛的命令（比如守护某个房间或走廊）。如果你没有下达命令，该生物将执行回避动作且只会为躲避危险而移动。一旦被下达命令，该生物会持续执行命令直到任务完成。

这些受操纵生物只会在 24 小时内服从你的命令，在之后，它们会停止遵守你下达的命令。若你想将对这些生物的控制时间再延长24小时，则你必须在当前24小时的时间段终止前再次对这些生物施展该法术。法术的此种用法只能延长你对至多四个你使用此法术所创造生物的控制时间，而不会创造新的生物。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，你就能多唤起两只亡灵生物，或是多延长对两只亡灵生物的控制。你无法用同一具骸骨或遗体唤起多个亡灵生物。

Harm.name: 重伤术
Harm.description: 你对施法距离内一个你能看到生物降下恶毒致命的魔法。目标必须通过一次体质豁免，豁免失败则受到 14d6 的暗蚀伤害，并且它的最大生命值会降低等同它受到的暗蚀伤害的数值。豁免成功则受到半数伤害。该法术不能将目标的最大生命值降至 1 以下。

Insect Plague.name: 疫病虫群
Insect Plague.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，并以该点为中心使半径 20 尺的球状区域内堆满成群的噬人蝗虫。虫群使整个区域成为 &Reference[DifficultTerrain] ，且处于 &Reference[LightlyObscured]，在法术终止前都会持续存在。

当虫群显现时，其区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败则受到 4d10 的穿刺伤害，豁免成功受到半数伤害。生物在一个回合内第一次进入该区域内，或者在区域内结束其回合时，也必须进行该豁免。一名生物每回合仅需进行一次该豁免。

升环施法：使用六环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比五环高一环，伤害就增加 1d10。

Whirlwind of Sand.name: 沙旋风
Whirlwind of Sand.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by an attack roll. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 2 to its AC against the attack, possibly causing the attack to miss, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. Each creature of its choice that it can see within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. of its destination space has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Expend Use.name: 耗用
Expend Use.condition: 攻击生物被一次攻击检定命中。

+2 AC.name: AC+2
+2 AC.description: 攻击生物令其对抗那次攻击的AC+2，可能令那次攻击改为失手。

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: 标空间5尺内的其选择的每名生物陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=long] 状态，直至木乃伊的下个回合结束。

Dread Command.name: 震怖命令
Dread Command.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用施法施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command}（2 环版本）。此后 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 不能再执行此动作，直至其下一回合开始。

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你 5 尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Necrotic Strike.name: 死灵打击
Necrotic Strike.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .mmRottingFist000]] or [[/item .d6GVHcFrHv83C7eS]] 攻击。

Dreadful Glare.name: 恐怖怒视
Dreadful Glare.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态, 直至木乃伊领主的下一回合开始。

Myconid Adult.description:
蕈人

Sun Sickness.name: 厌日症
Sun Sickness.description: While in sunlight, [[lookup @name lowercase]] D20检定具有劣势。 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 待在阳光下超过1小时就会死亡。

Pacifying Spores.name: 安抚孢子
Pacifying Spores.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6c9CieCQWV7XsKLy]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=6c9CieCQWV7XsKLy]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=6c9CieCQWV7XsKLy]] [[lookup @range.units activity=6c9CieCQWV7XsKLy]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=6c9CieCQWV7XsKLy]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=6c9CieCQWV7XsKLy]], it succeeds automatically.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Rapport Spores.name: 通念孢子
Rapport Spores.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] expels spores in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=WohqBNidY6nmDuum]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=WohqBNidY6nmDuum]] Emanation originating from itself. Creatures in that area with an Intelligence score of 2 or higher that aren’t Constructs, Elementals, or Undead gain telepathy with a range of 30 feet for [[lookup @duration.value activity=WohqBNidY6nmDuum]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=WohqBNidY6nmDuum]].

Myconid Sovereign.name: 蕈人王
Myconid Sovereign.description:
Myconids

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=6c9CieCQWV7XsKLy]] minute, it succeeds automatically.

Sun Sickness.description: While in sunlight, [[lookup @name lowercase]] D20检定具有劣势。 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 待在阳光下超过1小时就会死亡。

Rapport Spores.name: 通念孢子
Rapport Spores.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] expels spores in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=WohqBNidY6nmDuum]]-foot Emanation originating from itself. Creatures in that area with an Intelligence score of 2 or higher that aren’t Constructs, Elementals, or Undead gain telepathy with a range of 30 feet for [[lookup @duration.value activity=WohqBNidY6nmDuum]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=WohqBNidY6nmDuum]].

Demonic Restoration.name: 恶魔复苏
Demonic Restoration.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]] 于无底深渊之外死去，其身躯会化为灰烬，并立即在无底深渊某处获得一具新的身体，以满生命值复活。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 攻击。

Teleport.name: 传送
Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] 传送至多 [[lookup @range.value activity=dnoRMdFzhUUku26D]] 尺到一处其可见的未占空间。

Horror Nimbus.name: 恐惧灵气
Horror Nimbus.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]], until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] out of line of sight.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Horror Nimbus for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for 1 minute, until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the attacking creature out of line of sight.

Pursuit.name: 追击
Pursuit.description: Trigger: Another creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see ends its move within [[lookup @range.value activity=blUXkjLhs9kD2ofo]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Teleport, but its destination space must be [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=blUXkjLhs9kD2ofo]].

Needle Blight.name: 枯针怪
Needle Blight.description:
枯萎怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.oIXTiU1B2cJqnVtP caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

枯针怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.ipVmBSov2XlEc47B caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Needles.name: 枯针射击
Needles.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +3, range 30/60 ft. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) Piercing damage.

Coven Magic.name: 集会魔法
Coven Magic.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell’s normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAugury0000]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLocateObje]{Locate Object}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplUnseenServ]{Unseen Servant}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

Augury.name: 卜筮术
Augury.description:
你从异界存在处获得对某道有关你在接下来的30分钟内所计划执行的一系列行动之结果的预示。DM从下列预示中选取一个：

预兆预示着…
吉好的结果。
凶坏的结果。
吉凶并存结果既有好的方面，也有坏的方面。
无结果并无明显的好坏分别。

该法术将不会对任何环境因素进行解释，比如可能会对结果产生改变的一些其他法术。若你在两次长休之间使用两次或更多次的卜筮术，则法术在第一次施展之后会每次累积25%概率会不给出任何结果。

Find Familiar.name: Find Familiar
Find Familiar.description:
你获得一只为你服务的魔宠，魔宠精魄可以采用下述你选择的动物形态之一：蝙蝠、猫、青蛙、鹰、蜥蜴、章鱼、猫头鹰、老鼠、渡鸦、蜘蛛、鼬，你也可以选择其他挑战等级为 0 的野兽作为魔宠的形态。魔宠出现在施法距离内一处未被占据的空间，虽然有着所选的生物属性数据，但其生物种类为天族，妖精或邪魔（由你选择）而非野兽。你的魔宠可脱离你独立行动，不过它会一直遵循你的命令行事。

心灵连接。 你的魔宠距你 100 尺内期间，你可以与其进行心灵交流。此外，你还可以用一个附赠动作将自己的视觉和听觉切换到魔宠的感官，并一持续至你下一回合开始。在此期间，你同时享有该魔宠自身的特殊感官。

最后，当你施展施法距离为触碰的法术时，你的魔宠可以帮你传递这道触碰法术。此时你的魔宠必须距你 100 尺内，且其必须在你施展这道法术时执行一个反应将其传递。

战斗。 魔宠是你和你盟友的盟友。战斗时，它为自己骰先攻，并在自己回合里行动。魔宠无法攻击，但是它能如常执行其他动作。

魔宠的消失。 当魔宠生命值降至 0 点时，它会消失。它会在你再次施展此法术后重新出现。你可以用一个魔法动作，暂时解散你的魔宠，将其送入一个口袋位面。你也可以选择永久解散它。暂时解散时，你可以用一个魔法动作使其重新出现于距你 30 尺内任意未占空间中。当魔宠生命值归 0 或消失进入了口袋位面时，它都会将自己穿着或携带的任何物品留在自己曾占据的空间中。

独一无二。 你在同一时间不能拥有多于一只魔宠。如果你在已拥有一只魔宠期间施展此法术，作为替代，你会使其采用一个新的符合条件的形态。

Identify.name: 鉴定术
Identify.description:
你指定一个物件，并在施法过程中一直与其保持接触。如果该物件是魔法物品或其他附有魔力的物件，则你将知晓其属性和使用方式，以及了解是否需要与之同调。若它是充能物品则你将得知它现存的可用次数。你还可以发现是否有法术正影响该物件，以及可能存在的法术效应具体来自哪项法术。如果目标由法术所创，则你将知晓具体来自哪项法术。

如果你施法过程中一直接触的是一生物，则你将知晓其是否受法术影响，及产生影响的法术效应具体来自哪些法术。

Locate Object.name: 物件定位术
Locate Object.description:
你点名或描述一个你熟悉的物件。只要该物件与你相距不超过 1000 尺，你就会感测到该物件的方位。如果该物件正在移动，则你也将知晓其移动的方向。

该法术可定位一个你认识的特定物件，不过你需要在 30 尺内近距离看到过该物件至少一次；或者它也可定位特定的一类物件（如某种服装、珠宝、家具、工具或武器）中距你最近个体。

如果有任意厚度的铅，即使只是薄薄一片铅片阻挡了你与被定位物件间的通路，则该物件也无法被该法术所定位。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Unseen Servant.name: 隐形仆役
Unseen Servant.description:
该法术创造出一个隐形、无心智、无定形的中型 力场。你可以在法术终止前命令它进行简单的工作。该仆役被创造出来后出现在施法距离内一处未占空间的地面上。其 AC 为 10，具有 1 生命值，力量为 2，且不能攻击。若仆从的生命值降至 0，则法术终止。

在每个自己回合内以一个附赠动作 ，你可以精神性的对仆役下达一道命令，使其移动至多 15 尺并与一个物件进行互动。仆役可以做人类能做到的简单工作，例如拿取东西、打扫卫生、修补东西、叠衣服、点火、上菜、倒饮料等。一旦你下达了命令，仆役就会尽全力去进行任务直至完成任务，并在此后等待你的下一个命令。

如果你命令仆役做一件需要它离开你身边 60 尺的工作，则法术终止。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Soul Bag.name: 灵魂袋
Soul Bag.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a soul bag. While holding or carrying the bag, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its Nightmare Haunting action.

The bag has AC 15, HP 20, and Resistance to all damage. The bag turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points. If the bag is destroyed, any souls the bag is holding are released. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new bag after 7 days.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] 攻击。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile} (level 4 version)

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPhantasmal]{Phantasmal Killer}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift} (self only)

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Nightmare Haunting.name: 噩梦缠身
Nightmare Haunting.description:
While on the Ethereal Plane, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDream00000]{Dream}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. Only the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can serve as the spell’s messenger, and the target must be a [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]]. The spell fails and is wasted if the target is under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]{Protection from Evil and Good} spell or within a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicCircl]{Magic Circle} spell.

If the target takes damage from the Dream spell, the target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to that damage. If the spell kills the target, its soul is trapped in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s soul bag, and the target can’t be raised from the dead until its soul is released.

Dream.name: 托梦术
Dream.description:
你指定一名你知道且与你同处一个存在位面的生物。你或一名被你触碰的自愿生物将作为信使进入出神状态。该状态下，信使陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态且速度降为 0。

如果目标正睡着，则信使可以在法术持续时间内出现在其梦中并在其沉睡期间与之交流。信使能够塑造梦中的环境，创造景观，物件和其他影像。信使可以随时结束出神状态，以此终止法术。目标在醒来后能清楚地记得其梦境的内容。

如果你施法时目标醒着，则信使可以了解到这点。此时信使可以终止出神并结束法术，或是等待目标入睡再进入其梦境。

你可以让信使以可怕的形象出现。但此时信使只能提供不超过十个单词的信息，随后目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免。豁免失败时，目标便无法从休息中获益，并在其醒来时受到 3d6 点心灵伤害。

Trance State.name: 出神状态
Trance State.description: 信使陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态且速度降为 0。

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Etherealness.name: 以太化
Etherealness.description:
你进入当前所处位面与以太位面边缘的重叠空间。你在法术持续时间内一直呆在该以太边界。在此期间，你可以向任意方向移动。如果你向上或向下移动，则你移动的每尺距离需要额外消耗一尺的移动力。你可以观察原位面，但是所有事物都以灰度显示，而你也看不到 60 尺外的东西。

处于以太位面期间，只有同样处在以太位面的其他生物、物件和效应才能被你影响或影响你。不在以太位面的生物无法察觉你，也无法与你互动，除非有一项特性允许他们这么做。

法术终止时，你立刻回到原本所在的位面中与以太边界中你所处位置相对应的空间位置。若你出现于一处被占空间，则你立刻被弹到最靠近的一处未占空间中，并受到两倍于你因此被移动尺数点的力场伤害。

如果你在施展法术时正处于以太位面，或所在位面与以太位面不相连（比如某个外层位面），则法术立即结束。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比七环高一环，你就可以多指定三名自愿生物（包括你在内）。这些生物在你施法时必须距你 10 尺内。

Magic Missile.name: 魔法飞弹magic missile
Magic Missile.description:
你创造三枚由魔法力场形成的闪光飞镖，并让每发飞镖袭向施法距离内你能看见的指定生物。每发飞镖对目标造成 1d4 + 1 的力场伤害。所有飞镖将同时袭向目标，而你还可以指定它们击中同一个目标或是分别击中几个目标。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，该法术就会多制造出一支飞镖。

[[2 + @item.level]]{环阶 [[lookup @item.level]] 飞弹}

Phantasmal Killer.name: 魅影杀手
Phantasmal Killer.description:
你指定施法距离内一名你可见的生物，窥探其噩梦，依此创造一道只有目标能看见的幻象。目标生物进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败时，目标受到 4d10 点心灵伤害，且在法术持续时间内在属性检定和攻击掷骰上具有劣势。豁免成功，则目标只受一半伤害，法术终止。

法术持续时间内，目标在其每回合结束时进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 豁免，豁免失败则再次受到心灵伤害。豁免成功则法术终止。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比四环高一环，伤害就增加 1d10。

Fears Manifested.name: 陷入噩梦
Fears Manifested.description:
在法术持续时间内在属性检定和攻击掷骰上具有劣势。

法术持续时间内，你在其每回合结束时进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 豁免，豁免失败则再次受到心灵伤害。豁免成功则法术终止。

Plane Shift.name: 位面转移
Plane Shift.description:
你和至多八名手牵着手形成一个圆圈的生物被输送到一个不同的存在位面。你可以概括地指名一个目的地，比如火元素位面的黄铜之城或九层地狱第二层迪斯帕特的宫殿，按照DM的判断，你将出现在目的地里或其附近。

另外，如果你知道某个处于另一位面的传送法阵的印记序列，则该法术可以把你带到该法阵处。如果该传送法阵太小而装不下所有你输送的生物，则他们会出现在离传送法阵最近的未占空间中。

Confer Fire Resistance.name: 赋予火焰抗性
Confer Fire Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grant Resistance to Fire damage to a rider while it is on the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Resistance: Fire.name: 抗性：火焰
Resistance: Fire.description: 骑乘梦魇期间，梦魇可以赋予一名骑手对火焰伤害的抗性。

Illumination.name: 照明
Illumination.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 散发出半径 10 尺的明亮光照以及额外 10 尺的微光光照。

Ethereal Stride.name: 以太折跃
Ethereal Stride.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and up to [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] [[lookup @range.units activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]]. of it teleport to the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa.

Noble.name: 贵族
Noble.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmBreastplat]{Breastplate}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}

Nobles

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.TVskfAu471arcBTq caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Noble

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.mZUN05Y3B77gCkk6 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 其对抗该次攻击时的AC +[[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]（可能令该次攻击失手）。

Use.name: Use
Use.condition: hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon

Noble Prodigy.name: Noble Prodigy
Noble Prodigy.description:
Nobles

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.TVskfAu471arcBTq caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Noble Prodigy

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.OEkcXqCvmgQD2wlj caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmBeguilingStrik]] attacks.

Beguiling Strike.name: Beguiling Strike
Beguiling Strike.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the user's next turn.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor} (included in AC), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBefuddleme]{Befuddlement}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShatter000]{Shatter} (level 7 version)

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to that spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Jnn25hKp9FEjaHsk.name: Shield
Jnn25hKp9FEjaHsk.description: An imperceptible barrier of magical force protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

Imperceptible Barrier.name: Imperceptible Barrier
Imperceptible Barrier.description: Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from Magic Missile.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn’t wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target’s base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻影
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用一个研究动作调查该声响或影像时，必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。幻象在看穿它的生物面前会显得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其它声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件大小不得大于一个边长 5 尺的立方体。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Befuddlement.name: 摧心术
Befuddlement.description:
你将一个施法距离内你可见的生物的心灵爆破。该目标必须进行一次智力豁免。

若豁免失败，目标受到10d12心灵伤害，并且无法施展法术也无法执行魔法动作。受术生物每过 30 日即可在当日结束时重复进行该豁免，豁免成功则此法术效应终止。此效应也可以被@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{医疗术}或@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{祈愿术}终止。

若豁免成功，则目标只会受到一半伤害。

Befuddled.name: 摧心术
Befuddled.description: 若豁免失败，目标受到10d12心灵伤害，并且无法施展法术也无法执行魔法动作。受术生物每过 30 日即可在当日结束时重复进行该[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则此法术效应终止。此效应也可以被@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{医疗术}或@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{祈愿术}终止。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Fly.name: 飞行术
Fly.description:
你触碰一个自愿生物。目标在法术持续时间内获得 60 尺的飞行速度且可以悬浮。法术终止时，如果目标仍在空中则随即坠落，除非其能停止坠落。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，就可以额外再指定一名生物作为法术目标。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Shatter.name: 粉碎音波
Shatter.description:
一阵震耳欲聋的噪音在你指定的施法距离内一点上爆发出来。以该点为中心半径 10 尺球状区域内的所有生物必须要进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败将受到 3d8 点雷鸣伤害；豁免成功受到半数伤害。构装生物进行该豁免时具有劣势。

如果法术的范围内存在不被任何生物着装携带的非魔法物件，则它也要受到该伤害。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术伤害就增加 1d8。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item Claw]] 攻击。

Rotting Gaze.name: 腐朽凝视
Rotting Gaze.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Weird Insight.name: 怪异洞悉
Weird Insight.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]] feet.

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically learns one fact or secret about the target.

Fiendish Restoration.name: 邪魔复苏
Fiendish Restoration.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]]死于焦炎火狱之外，其身体会溶解成脓水，并立即在焦炎火狱某处重新生成一具新的身体，以满生命值复活。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmMercurialAxe00]] 攻击。

Mercurial Axe.name: 变幻巨斧
Mercurial Axe.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]]/[[lookup @item.range.long]] ft. [[/damage average extended]]. Hit or Miss: The axe magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Shadowy Teleport.name: 蔽影传送
Shadowy Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=OkgNdhDVAMk4wyEa]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=OkgNdhDVAMk4wyEa]], and it teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=OkgNdhDVAMk4wyEa]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see. The condition ends early immediately after it deals damage.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 陷入 &Reference[Invisible apply=false] 状态，持续 1 分钟。

Amorphous.name: 无定形
Amorphous.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以移动穿过最窄 1 寸宽的空间而无需消耗额外的移动力。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在难以攀爬的表面上攀爬，包括沿着天花板移动，且不需要为此进行属性检定。

Split.name: 分裂
Split.description: 触发：若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 体型 [[lookup @activation.condition activity=zoXFSgzmWq8frUjI]]响应：[[lookup @name lowercase]] 分裂为两个全新的 [[lookup @name capitalize]]。每个新的 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 都比原先 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的体型小一级，且在原[[lookup @name lowercase]] 的先攻值上行动。原[[lookup @name lowercase]] 的生命值将平均分配给两只新的 [[lookup @name lowercase]] （向下取整）。

Split.name: 分裂
Split.condition: 为大型或中型，且具有 10+ 生命值，当布丁进入浴血状况，或当它即将受闪电伤害或挥砍伤害影响时。

Compression.name: 柔韧躯体
Compression.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以移动穿过最窄 1 寸宽的空间而无需消耗额外的移动力。

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from all four tentacles.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC) from all four tentacles.

Ogre.name: Ogre
Ogre.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatclub0]{Greatclub}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepJavelin000]{Javelins (3)}

Ogres

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.1Hp2MOUaAODie8ex caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Ogre

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.kqE5GUlHs8pLCwvw caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Ogre Zombie.name: 食人魔丧尸
Ogre Zombie.description:
Zombies

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.2xCqDBEM46bLXD4q caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Ogre Zombie

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.0T8giAslc7JILSGC caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Undead Fortitude.name: 不死坚韧
Undead Fortitude.description: 当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 因非光耀非重击伤害生命值降至0时，其进行一次体质豁免（DC为5+所受伤害）。豁免成功则改为将 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的生命值降至1。

Ogrillon Ogre.name: 半食人魔
Ogrillon Ogre.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepBattleaxe0]{Battleaxe}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepJavelin000]{Javelins (3)}

Ogres

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.1Hp2MOUaAODie8ex caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Ogrillon Ogre

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.PSeo538HYRWHAkpE caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Regeneration.name: 再生
Regeneration.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 至少拥有 1 点生命值，则其在自己的回合开始时恢复 [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] 点生命值。

heal.condition: 在其回合开始时，至少拥有 1 点生命值

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] or [[/item .mmNightmareRay00]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmSpellcasting00]].

Nightmare Ray.name: 噩梦射线
Nightmare Ray.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid or a Large Giant, or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person} (level 2 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGaseousFor]{Gaseous Form}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSleep00000]{Sleep}

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{隐形术} 于自身，无需法术成分并使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

7zCgLqwWT0prZxhy.name: 隐形术
7zCgLqwWT0prZxhy.description:
你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Charm Person.name: 魅惑类人
Charm Person.description:
选择法术距离内你可见的一名类人生物，迫使该生物进行一次感知豁免，如果你或者你的同伴正在与它战斗，它进行的这次豁免将具有优势。如果它豁免失败，它陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态直到法术结束，或者直到你或你的同伴对它造成伤害。被魅惑的生物将对你友好。在法术结束时，生物会知道它曾被你魅惑。

升环施法：使用的法术位每高一环，你就可以额外选择一个生物作为目标。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 目标陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态直到法术结束，或者直到施法者或施法者的同伴对它造成伤害。被魅惑的生物将对施法者友好。在法术结束时，生物会知道它曾被施法者魅惑。

Darkness.name: 黑暗
Darkness.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，并在法术持续时间内使魔法性 &Reference[darkness] 斥以该点为中心半径 15 尺的球状区域。黑暗视觉也无法看穿这这种黑暗，非魔法的光照也无法将其照亮。

或者，你可以将此法术施展于一个未被着装或携带的物件上，使黑暗充斥以该物件为中心的 15 尺光环区域。将该物件用不透明的东西遮掩（比如用碗或头盔盖住）时，会将黑暗隔绝。

如果法术区域与任何二环或更低环阶法术创造的明亮光照或微光光照区域重叠，则这些造光的法术将被解除。

Gaseous Form.name: 气化形体
Gaseous Form.description:
在法术持续时间内，你将触碰到的一名自愿生物连同其穿着携带物一起转化为一团云雾。如果目标的生命值降至 0 或其用一个魔法动作终止其身上的法术效应，则那个目标身上的法术终止。

在该形态下，目标唯一的移动方式即是 10 尺的飞行速度，且可以悬浮。该目标可以进入并占据一个已有生物占据的空间。其拥有钝击、穿刺和挥砍伤害的抗性，其对 &Reference[prone apply=false] 状态免疫，且进行力量、敏捷和体质豁免时具有优势。该目标可以穿过狭隙，但会将液态物质视为固体表面。

云雾形态的目标不能讲话或操作物件，其随身携带或持握的物件不会掉落，也不能被使用或与之互动。另外，目标也不能攻击或施法。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，就可以额外再指定一名生物作为法术目标。

Gaseous Form.name: 气化形体
Gaseous Form.description: 在该形态下，你唯一的移动方式即是 10 尺的飞行速度，且可以悬浮。你可以进入并占据一个已有生物占据的空间。其拥有钝击、穿刺和挥砍伤害的抗性，其对 &Reference[prone apply=false] 状态免疫，且进行力量、敏捷和体质豁免时具有优势。你可以穿过狭隙，但会将液态物质视为固体表面。

Sleep.name: 睡眠术
Sleep.description:
以施法距离内一点为源点，5 尺半径球状区域内每个你选择的生物都必须成功通过一次感知豁免否则直到其下个回合结束陷入 &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] 状态。在其下个回合结束时，它必须重复此豁免。如果目标第二次豁免失败，目标在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[unconscious] 如果目标受到伤害，或其 5 尺内有人用一个动作将它摇醒，目标身上的法术结束。

不会睡眠的生物，比如精灵或免疫力竭状态的生物自动成功通过对抗此法术的豁免。

Sleeping.name: 昏睡
Sleeping.description: 你直到下个回合结束前陷入 &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] 状态。在其下个回合结束时，它必须重复此豁免。如果目标第二次豁免失败，目标在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[unconscious] 如果目标受到伤害，或其 5 尺内有人用一个动作将它摇醒，目标身上的法术结束。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and two [[/item Tentacle]] attacks.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. Whenever the Poisoned target finishes a Long Rest, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.formula activity=tKShuY4vDM7tn9aC]].

Failure: The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/damage 1d10 average]] and doesn’t return to normal until the Poisoned condition ends on the target.

Success: The Poisoned condition ends.

save.condition: Whenever the Poisoned target finishes a Long Rest

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. Whenever the Poisoned target finishes a Long Rest, it must make a Constitution Saving Throw or have its Hit Point maximum reduced by [[/damage 1d10 average]] until the Poisoned condition ends.

Tentacle.name: 触须
Tentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过中型，则其还会被两条触须之一擒抱陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description:
逃脱检定（见源物品DC）

[[/check skill=ath ability=str]]

[[/check skill=acr ability=dex]]

Tentacle Slam.name: 触须猛击
Tentacle Slam.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=VC2iSwNPNaZ7M2bT]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=VC2iSwNPNaZ7M2bT]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Stunned.name: 震慑

Warding Charm.name: Warding Charm
Warding Charm.description:
Trigger: A creature hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with an attack roll.

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zTaurVqDcUSvviyB]], the triggering creature.

Failure: The attack roll misses the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Save.name: 豁免
Save.condition: A creature hits the attacking creature with an attack roll.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: If the attack roll misses the attacking creature's target, the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻影
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用一个研究动作调查该声响或影像时，必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。幻象在看穿它的生物面前会显得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其它声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件大小不得大于一个边长 5 尺的立方体。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Major Image.name: 高等幻影
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Project Image.name: 投影术
Project Image.description:
你创造一个自己的幻象分身，并使其在法术持续时间内维持存在。该分身可以出现在施法距离内你曾见过的任何地点，而不论中间是否存在障碍物。该幻象看起来和听起来都与你一样，只是没有现实形体。幻象受到伤害时会立即消失，法术终止。

你可以通过分身的眼睛视物，用分身的耳朵聆听，如同你处于它的位置一样。用一个魔法动作，你能使分身移动至多 60 尺，而其姿态、言语和行为均按照你的指定作表现。幻象可以完美地模仿你的举止。

由于东西可以穿过幻象，任何与该幻象进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻觉本质。一名生物可以采取研究动作进行一次对抗你法术豁免DC的成功 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定以看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看穿该影像，其产生的声响对该生物而言显得虚假。

Performer Maestro.description:

Tasha's Hideous Laughter.name: 塔莎狂笑术
Tasha's Hideous Laughter.description:
One creature of your choice that you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it has the &Reference[prone apply=false] and &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] conditions for the duration. During that time, it laughs uncontrollably if it’s capable of laughter, and it can’t end the Prone condition on itself.

At the end of each of its turns and each time it takes damage, it makes another [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] saving throw. The target has Advantage on the save if the save is triggered by damage. On a successful save, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level about 1.

Uncontrollable Laughter.name: 难抑狂笑
Uncontrollable Laughter.description:
has the &Reference[prone apply=false] and &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] conditions for the duration. During that time, it laughs uncontrollably if it’s capable of laughter, and it can’t end the Prone condition on itself.

At the end of each of its turns and each time it takes damage, it makes another [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] saving throw. The target has Advantage on the save if the save is triggered by damage. On a successful save, the spell ends.

Talons.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the attack reduces a Humanoid target to 0 Hit Points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] kills the target by removing its heart.

Ethereal Sight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane.

Bite.name: 啃咬

If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the target becomes Stable, and it has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. While Poisoned, the target also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Poisoned & Paralyzed.name: Poisoned & Paralyzed
Poisoned & Paralyzed.description: f this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the target becomes Stable, and it has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. While Poisoned, the target also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Defensive Stance.name: Defensive Stance
Defensive Stance.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 4 to its AC against melee attack rolls (including the triggering attack) until the start of its next turn, possibly causing the attacks to miss.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.
